title: Debonair Ezreal Locked After I Bought Him
body: A while ago, i bought Debonair Ezreal and played a bunch of games with him. Yesterday, i wanted to play ezreal and saw that the skin is locked now. I dont want to have to buy rp just to buy a skin that i already bought, but i did really like that skin. Is there anyway of me getting it back?

replies.body:
Hiya, 

If you're missing content, please submit a ticket to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584). They'd be able to take a look at your account and see why you're missing Debonair Ezreal.
I had a similar problem with a mystery skin I received, I couldn't use it after I got it. Though once I signed out and back in it resolved itself. {{item:3070}}
